channel.title: Pages on Hsing-Yu Shih
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Hsing-Yu Shih

item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hi, My name is Hsing-Yu Shih(施星宇). I am currently a graduate student at Nationla Taiwan University and major in communication engineering. I have a bachelor’s degree from National Taiwan University, majoring in information management with a double major in forestry.

I love magic, and I was the vice president of the magic club in college and participated in many performances. During the period of participating in the magic club, I learned the technique of making props and accumulated many Maker skills.

In the graduated institute, I research topic is suspicious account detection of online services, mainly in the fields of data science, machine learning and communication network. At the same time, I also joined a photography club to learn darkroom techniques and photography skills.

In the summer of 2021, I became an intern at Microsoft, which gave me a better understanding of the development technology and working model in the technology giant. In anticipation of graduating in the summer of 2022, I started my interview journey.

About This Site

In 2022, a friend reminded me that we had accumulated so much knowledge and experience that it was time to document it.
